org.happy.artist.rmdmia.rcsm.providers.ros.client.transport.tcpros
Class TCPROSPublisherCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  org.happy.artist.rmdmia.rcsm.providers.ros.client.transport.tcpros.TCPROSPublisherCommunicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationReceiverInterface, CommunicationSenderInterface
public class TCPROSPublisherCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommunicationSenderInterface, CommunicationReceiverInterface

TCPROSPublisherCommunicator.java TCPROSPublisherCommunicator client for specified TCP server, port number & packet length. Must call initialize() after construction is completed, and before the Runnable start() method. Each TCPROS Publisher connection should use this class to send data to the specified host/port.

getMessageHandlerController

public MessageHandlerControllerInterface getMessageHandlerController()
                                                              throws RCSMException
Return the MessageHandlerControllerInterface. The Controller interface sets the message handler on the message receiver to one of 3 pre-configured message handler classes (includes the tuner).

Returns:
MessageHandlerControllerInterface
Throws:
RCSMException - if the initialize method has not been called.

send

public void send(byte[] data)
          throws java.io.IOException
only call send, after TCPROSPublisherCommunicator initialize method is called at once at Object initialization time. Keep in mind this data array should match the length of the packetLength.

Specified by:
send in interface CommunicationSenderInterface
Parameters:
data - The byte[] data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

send

public void send(byte[] data,
                 int publisher_id)
          throws java.io.IOException
Send a message to the specific topic data processor connection, by connection id. This send message is used to establish a publisher/subscriber method, and is ignored once the TCPROS Connection Header, and latched message (if enabled) is exchanged.

Specified by:
send in interface CommunicationSenderInterface
Parameters:
data - The byte[] data.
publisher_id - The int data processor id.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

setReadBlockSize

public void setReadBlockSize(int blockSize)
Set the read block size for incoming TCP data reads. Only use if the block size changes from the initialize black size.

public int getReadBlockSize()
Return the currently set read block size.

          throws java.io.IOException

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Description copied from interface: CommunicationSenderInterface
Return boolean is running. This is important if the start method is called followed by a call to send, to prevent an exception due to null streams caused by a thread that did not complete its startup process before calling send. In a later release this may be separated to another interface.

Specified by:
isRunning in interface CommunicationReceiverInterface
Specified by:
isRunning in interface CommunicationSenderInterface
Returns:
boolean is provider running.
